---
title: "Welcome!"
---

It is a three-hour course on how to use **Git** and **GitHub** to collaboratively develop open source software with the R language.
It has been given for [rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/)'s [Champions program](https://ropensci.org/champions/) in 2023, for [RLadies Salzburg in 2024](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-salzburg/events/302141143/) and for rOpenSci's Champions program in 2024.

Please visit the ["Preparation"](preparation.html) section to follow the instructions to install git and setup everything you'll need for the course.
